name: quizzing
content:

the activity of taking part in quizzes (= games in which you answer questions): Quizzing has become one of the nation's favourite activities. This site is great for anyone who likes quizzing.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat is it about quizzing that you enjoy so much?That was great quizzing!If you know all the 3 answers, mail back to us, and grab your prize! Happy quizzing!
